description: Initiated the development of an interactive 360 video viewer with video controllers, improving the user experience.
Imported characters assets and integrated their animation files to the application, adding a dynamism to the scene environment
Tested and documented errors to improve the application responsiveness.
Designed and developed a system to create an interactive storytelling virtual reality application, incorporating coroutines, delegates, and events within Unityâ€™s tools and workflows.
Collaborated with developers to integrate 3d characters animations, modified shaders and added particle effects, resulting in a boost in visual appeal and overall project quality.
Prototyped virtual reality applications compatible with Meta Quest experimental features, such as the Meta Scene Model, for integration into existing projects.
Contributed innovative ideas and insights during daily stand-up meetings to improve application mechanics and user experiences.
